title.rendered: The 2018 Reigning Champs Return to the Fraxa Biotech Games!

content.rendered:
Yesterday the reigning champs at ClinLab Staffing returned to the Fraxa Biotech Games to compete again for the 1st place title. It was a great day for a little friendly competition for an excellent cause between biotech companies in the greater Boston area which we were honored to be a part of! In spite of our best efforts it was time to share the 1st place title with the new champions at Synlogic. Congratulations new champs!

FRAXA Biotech Games™ brings together the Boston biotech community to network in a friendly setting, form new relationships and potential collaborations while raising money for a great cause!

Proceeds of the event support FRAXA Research Foundation, which funds Fragile X research in Boston, including Harvard, MIT, Tufts, MGH, and Boston Children’s Hospital. FRAXA’s mission is to find effective treatments and ultimately a cure for Fragile X, the most common inherited cause of autism and learning disabilities worldwide.

Watch out for the return of the ClinLab Staffing champions in 2020!
